channel.title: Problem with starting new server.. please help
channel.description: ok, well when i went to the sever tutorial section of the forum.. i went to How to make a server... i did everything it did... i got a little confused on the part about the source... Well i got my source from http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6915.0.html I went to the folder it was in and compressed it with winrar.. it has the runMoparScape icon there. I double clicked that when client.silabsoft.org was up, it said press any key to continue. I clicked a key but it didnt do anything but disappear. PLease Help.. idk what im doing wrong.

item.title: Problem with starting new server.. please help
item.dc:creator: @The_Hippie The_Hippie
item.description:
@The_Hippie wrote:

Well i downloaded the source you gave me… extracted it in the same folder… when i went to its folder and went down to runserver a black box came up and said “the system could not find the path specified”. … any more sources? or any more suggestions?

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with starting new server.. please help

item.title: Problem with starting new server.. please help
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

thats the client man, you need a source, eh i recommand this source http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285492.0.html , figment scape, it looks good and stuff.
so yeah when you download it, extract it, hit run, and log in with silabs.
